DOC.brief_summary: In study healthy old adult request consume 4 different high-protein nutritional supplement . Each subject visit site 4 time every visit consume 1 4 product series blood sample take . The blood sample analyze amino acid bioavailability blood 4 hour consumption .
DOC.brief_title: Amino Acid Bioavailability Healthy Elderly After Intake Oral Nutritional Supplement
DOC.criteria: Age 65 year old BMI 21 30 kg/m2 Any condition may interfere definition 'healthy elderly ' accord investigator 's judgement . Any ( history ) gastrointestinal disease interfere GI function ( e.g . inflammatory bowel disease , gastroparesis , gastrectomy ) . Known allergy milk milk product . Known galactosaemia . Current recent ( within past three month ) smoking . Known suspected Diabetes Mellitus . Current infection fever last 7 day discretion physician . Use antibiotic within 3 week study entry . Current use corticosteroid hormone . Current use antacid medication influence gastric acid production . Requirement nutritional support . Unplanned body weight loss > 5 % past 36 month . Adherence specific diet ( e.g . weight loss , vegetarian ) . Use protein contain amino acid contain nutritional supplement within one week study entry . Alcohol drug abuse . Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability subject comply protocol requirement . Participation study investigational product concomitantly within 4 week study entry .
